code: import React from'react';import{formatPrice}from'../../untils';import'./ShoppingCart.css';import ListProduct from'./ListProduct';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{Link,useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Cart(props){const history=useHistory();const cartItems=useSelector(state=>state.cart.cartItems);var userInfo=useSelector(state=>state.userSignin.userInfo);const totalPrice=cartItems.reduce((total,item)=>total+item.qty*item.salePrice,0);const Order=()=>{if(userInfo){history.push("/order");}else{alert("ban can dang nhap");history.push("/login");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"shopping-cart",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shopping-cart",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shopping-cart-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"back",children:"Ti\u1EBFp t\u1EE5c mua h\xE0ng"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"shopping-cart-title",children:"Gi\u1ECF h\xE0ng"})]}),cartItems?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListProduct,{products:cartItems}):"",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"total-price",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"left",children:"T\u1ED5ng ti\u1EC1n"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"right",children:formatPrice(totalPrice)})]}),totalPrice<=0?"":/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"order",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{onClick:()=>Order(),children:" \u0110\u1EB7t H\xE0ng "})})]})});}export default Cart;
